metadata.title: Friday, 23rd March, 2018
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

questions.section: QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER NO. 30)
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to distribute desks to schools in Kalumbila District;
(b) if so, when the desks will be distributed;
(c) how many schools will benefit from the exercise; and
(d) what the total cost of purchasing and distributing the desks is.

questions.section: QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER NO. 30)
parts: (a) what has caused the delay in gazetting the 5 health facilities in Kaputa District;
(b) what the necessary conditions for a health facility to be gazetted are; and
(c) why the Mukupa-Katandula Rural Health Centre has not been gazetted to-date.

questions.section: QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER NO. 30)
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to electrify Chishi Island in Chifunabuli Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
